job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Title: Engineering Internship (Machine Learning Engineer) Job Description Noria Water Technologies seeks an intern with experience working in a laboratory environment and basic knowledge of image analysis and machine learning interested in gaining real-world experience. We are a water technology company providing unique solutions for improving operations of water-based processes through real-time monitoring, big data, and analytic capabilities. The candidate must be able to thrive in a dynamic, multi-disciplinary, and hands-on environment that values excellence, creativity, and innovation. Terms Fall 2021 from August to December Part-time during the school year: must be able to work 15-20 hours/week Flexible schedule can be arranged for part-time work during normal business hours Responsibilities In-person laboratory work Support of development projects Characterization of images of fouled/ scaled materials Set up and run reverse-osmosis experiments Setup image collection system, collect data, and apply image processing and machine learning techniques Assists with designs, experiments and assemblies as requested Benefits Practical experience with a wide variety of water treatment and desalination and data science tasks Collaborating hand-in-hand with interdisciplinary team Shadowing, mentoring, and training opportunities with seasoned professionals Flexible schedule for students Noria facilities are spacious with strict adherence to COVID-19 protection requirements Qualifications Required to be currently enrolled in a full-time Bachelor's degree or Graduate degree STEM program at an accredited college or university Must work on-site and be fully vaccinated Laboratory experience required Knowledge of basic data science and ability to use machine learning tools for image analysis Excellent analytical and mathematics skills Good verbal and written communications skills with ability to work in a team environment Experience programming in Python / C / C++, with AWS, or drawing CAD is a plus Job Function Engineering, Physical Sciences, Research, Science and Mathematics Location Los Angeles, California United States Salary Level Paid Approximate Hours Per Week 20 Startup Yes Desired Start Date August 9, 2021 Duration August - December 2021
